info.name: FurAffinity Project Phoenix V2.0
info.description: Since I seem to have lost the login for my old account, this is a continuation of where I left off here Good chunks of this code was based off of Artex's 'Grey Rust'
info.additionalInfo:
--Release Notes--

V2.0 - Sorry for the delay. I've been busy with things. V2.0 is here! And adds a new look to the inbox!

V 2.0.1 - Fixed a few issues here and there. Will likely be adding in custom background in next update

V 2.0.2 - More small fixes, like the [SFW] button, and some UCP[User Control Panel] buttons
